name: sfpwowerscript-validatedxunlockedpackage-task
friendlyName: Validates An Unlocked Package for Metadata Coverage
description: Validates  an Unlocked Package to check whether it only contain metadata as per the org coverage,This task is part of SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: Validates  an Unlocked Package to check whether it only contain metadata as per the org coverage, Utilize this task in a PR build for DX Unlocked Package
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package to be validated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the package to be validated, or validate all the packages in the project directory

inputs.name: bypass
inputs.label: Metadata  types to be bypassed from validation (Comma Seperated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of metadata that needs to be excluded from metadata validation check

inputs.name: working_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed
